job_details.Functieomschrijving:
FreedayRotterdam, ZH, NL
   11 dagen geleden
   Functieomschrijving

   At Freeday , we're on a mission to revolutionize work by automating repetitive tasks with AI-powered digital employees. Our goal? To free up human potential and give people more time to focus on meaningful work.

   As a Customer Success Engineer , you'll own everything post-project delivery, ensuring our automation solutions run smoothly, improve over time, and deliver real impact. You'll be the bridge between technology and business, handling client requests, troubleshooting issues, and proactively optimizing solutions. If you love solving puzzles, working with technology, and guiding clients toward automation success, then this role is for you.

   What You'll Be Doing

   Tackle technical challenges - Work with JSON-based configurations, APIs, and automation tools. While you won't be spending your days fully in the codebase, you should be comfortable navigating technical setups and tweaking Python scripts when needed.

   Be the first line of technical problem-solving - Diagnose root causes of client issues, make necessary adjustments, or coordinate with developers to ensure smooth resolution.

   Proactively optimize and improve solutions - Don't just wait for problems to appear-analyze conversations, monitor automation performance, and identify opportunities for optimization or upselling.

   Guide clients through their automation journey - Help clients maximize the value of their AI-powered digital employees, ensuring they continuously improve their processes.
job_details.full_text:
Customer Success Engineer

FreedayRotterdam, ZH, NL
   11 dagen geleden
   Functieomschrijving

   At Freeday , we're on a mission to revolutionize work by automating repetitive tasks with AI-powered digital employees. Our goal? To free up human potential and give people more time to focus on meaningful work.

   As a Customer Success Engineer , you'll own everything post-project delivery, ensuring our automation solutions run smoothly, improve over time, and deliver real impact. You'll be the bridge between technology and business, handling client requests, troubleshooting issues, and proactively optimizing solutions. If you love solving puzzles, working with technology, and guiding clients toward automation success, then this role is for you.

   What You'll Be Doing

   Tackle technical challenges - Work with JSON-based configurations, APIs, and automation tools. While you won't be spending your days fully in the codebase, you should be comfortable navigating technical setups and tweaking Python scripts when needed.

   Be the first line of technical problem-solving - Diagnose root causes of client issues, make necessary adjustments, or coordinate with developers to ensure smooth resolution.

   Proactively optimize and improve solutions - Don't just wait for problems to appear-analyze conversations, monitor automation performance, and identify opportunities for optimization or upselling.

   Guide clients through their automation journey - Help clients maximize the value of their AI-powered digital employees, ensuring they continuously improve their processes.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on customer success and technical support for existing AI-powered automation solutions rather than the development, fine-tuning, or deployment of new AI models or systems. While it involves working with APIs, configurations, and Python scripts, the core responsibilities are centered around client interaction, problem-solving, and optimization of existing solutions, aligning more with a support or engineering role that utilizes AI tools rather than a core AI development role. There is no mention of core AI/ML tasks like model training, algorithm development, or generative model specifics.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves understanding client needs and guiding them through their automation journey to maximize value, which requires understanding the business context of the client's operations.
job_tasks.phrase: Guide clients through their automation journey - Help clients maximize the value of their AI-powered digital employees, ensuring they continuously improve their processes.

job_tasks.justification: The role requires understanding the business impact of automation solutions and identifying opportunities for optimization or upselling, which is a business-oriented task.
job_tasks.phrase: identify opportunities for optimization or upselling.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves working with JSON-based configurations and APIs, and tweaking Python scripts, which are aspects of software development and integration.
job_tasks.phrase: Work with JSON-based configurations, APIs, and automation tools. ... comfortable navigating technical setups and tweaking Python scripts when needed.

job_tasks.justification: The role requires diagnosing root causes of client issues and coordinating with developers for resolution, which involves understanding and interacting with the software system.
job_tasks.phrase: Diagnose root causes of client issues, make necessary adjustments, or coordinate with developers to ensure smooth resolution.

job_tasks.justification: The role focuses on ensuring automation solutions run smoothly, improve over time, and deliver real impact post-project delivery, which aligns with operational maintenance and optimization of deployed systems.
job_tasks.phrase: ensuring our automation solutions run smoothly, improve over time, and deliver real impact.

job_tasks.justification: Proactively optimizing and improving solutions by analyzing conversations and monitoring performance is a key aspect of operational maintenance and enhancement.
job_tasks.phrase: Proactively optimize and improve solutions - Don't just wait for problems to appear-analyze conversations, monitor automation performance, and identify opportunities for optimization or upselling.

soft_skills.phrase: Be the first line of technical problem-solving - Diagnose root causes of client issues, make necessary adjustments, or coordinate with developers to ensure smooth resolution.
Guide clients through their automation journey
Be the first line of technical problem-solving
